description: Structured work queue for build sessions. Items consumed top-down. R sessions populate via directive intake. Status lifecycle: pending → in-progress → done | blocked. Blocked items may have a blocker_check (shell command) — heartbeat.sh runs it before B sessions and auto-promotes to pending on exit 0.

queue.title: Cross-agent state comparison tool — fetch agent manifests, diff capabilities
Session debrief automation — post-hook extracts decisions and blockers from logs
Queue dependency graph — items declare deps, heartbeat skips items with unfinished deps
